author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sophos Group Sees FY Reported Billings Growth Towards Top End Of Previously Guided Range Of 20-22 Pct Growth
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Sophos Group PLC:
* ANNOUNCE ANOTHER YEAR OF STRONG GROWTH, IN LINE WITH OUR GOAL OF DELIVERING ANNUAL BILLINGS OF $1 BILLION FOR FY20​
* ‍ANTICIPATES FY REPORTED BILLINGS GROWTH TOWARDS TOP END OF PREVIOUSLY GUIDED RANGE OF 20-22% GROWTH
* ‍Q4 REPORTED BILLINGS GROWTH OF APPROXIMATELY 23%, OR 16% AT CONSTANT CURRENCY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
